languages.text: "Запрос одобрен". {n}Паскаль ретиво распускает мехадендриты, и все они устремляются к монстру. Взвизгнувший бур глубоко врезается в броню, клешня со смачными щелчками отрывает куски пронизанного нитями проводки мяса. Тварь хрипит и бьется, но не может сбежать от безжалостного аутопсиста. Собранные образцы отправляются в портативный анализатор на силовой установке, а визор техножреца издает щелчки, запечатлевая процесс вскрытия на пикт-изображениях.{/n}

"Request approved." {n}Pasqal eagerly unfolds his mechadendrites and they all rush toward the monster. A shrieking drill cuts deep into the armour, while a claw hungrily snaps off chunks of the flesh pierced with strands of metal wire. The creature thrashes and wheezes but cannot escape the merciless vivisection. The collected samples are sent to a portable analyser and the Tech-Priest's visor clicks, recording the procedure in pict-images.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Запрос одобрен". {n}Паскаль ретиво распускает мехадендриты, и все они устремляются к монстру. Собранные образцы отправляются в портативный анализатор на силовой установке, а визор техножреца издает щелчки, запечатлевая процесс вскрытия на пикт-изображениях.{/n}

languages.text: 「要求は承認された」{n}パスカルが機械触手を広げ、全員が怪物に向かって突進する。悲鳴を上げるドリルが装甲を深く切り裂き、貪欲な爪が金属ワイヤーで貫かれた肉の塊をへし折る。生き物はのたうち回り、喘ぎ声を上げるが、無慈悲な解剖から逃れることはできない。採取されたサンプルはポータブル分析装置に送られ、技術司祭のバイザーがカチッと音を立て、解剖の様子を画像で記録する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request approved." {n}Pasqal eagerly unfolds his mechadendrites and they all rush toward the monster. A shrieking drill cuts deep into the armour, while a claw hungrily snaps off chunks of the flesh pierced with strands of metal wire. The creature thrashes and wheezes but cannot escape the merciless vivisection. The collected samples are sent to a portable analyser and the Tech-Priest's visor clicks, recording the procedure in pict-images.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「要求は承認された」{n}パスカルが機械触手を広げ、全員が怪物に向かって突進する。悲鳴を上げるドリルが装甲を深く切り裂き、貪欲な爪が金属ワイヤーで貫かれた肉の塊をへし折る。生き物はのたうち回り、喘ぎ声を上げるが、無慈悲な解剖から逃れることはできない。採取されたサンプルはポータブル分析装置に送られ、技術司祭のバイザーがカチッと音を立て、解剖の様子を画像で記録する。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “请求已接受。”{n}帕斯卡急切地伸开了机械触须，所有机械触须都立刻伸向了那只怪物。尖锐的钻头深深地嵌入了盔甲中，利爪贪婪地撕下一块块被电线刺穿的肉体。这只怪物不停地挣扎着、喘息着，但却无法从这场无情的解剖之中脱身。所有采集到的样本都被送到了便携式分析仪处，帕斯卡的面甲发出了“咔哒”一声，打开了视讯图像，记录解剖过程。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request approved." {n}Pasqal eagerly unfolds his mechadendrites and they all rush toward the monster. A shrieking drill cuts deep into the armour, while a claw hungrily snaps off chunks of the flesh pierced with strands of metal wire. The creature thrashes and wheezes but cannot escape the merciless vivisection. The collected samples are sent to a portable analyser and the Tech-Priest's visor clicks, recording the procedure in pict-images.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “请求已接受。”{n}帕斯卡急切地展开了机械触须，所有机械触须都立刻伸向了那只怪物。尖锐的钻头深深地嵌入了盔甲中，利爪贪婪地撕下一块块被电线刺穿的肉体。这只怪物不停地挣扎着、喘息着，但却无法从无情的机械触须之下脱身。所有采集到的样本都被送到了便携式分析仪处，帕斯卡的面甲发出了“咔哒”一声，打开了视讯图像，记录解剖过程。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Petición aprobada». {n}Pasqal despliega con entusiasmo sus mecadendritas y todos se abalanzan hacia el monstruo. Una perforadora corta profundamente la armadura, la garra arranca con avidez trozos de carne atravesados por hilos de alambre metálicos. La criatura se agita y jadea, pero no puede huir de la vivisección. Las muestras recogidas se envían a un analizador portátil y el visor del tecnosacerdote hace clic, registrando el procedimiento en imágenes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request approved." {n}Pasqal eagerly unfolds his mechadendrites and they all rush toward the monster. A shrieking drill cuts deep into the armour, while a claw hungrily snaps off chunks of the flesh pierced with strands of metal wire. The creature thrashes and wheezes but cannot escape the merciless vivisection. The collected samples are sent to a portable analyser and the Tech-Priest's visor clicks, recording the procedure in pict-images.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Petición aprobada». {n}Pasqal despliega con entusiasmo sus mecadendritas y todos se abalanzan hacia el monstruo. La perforadora corta profundamente la armadura, la garra arranca con avidez trozos de carne atravesados por hilos de alambre metálicos. La criatura se agita y jadea, pero no puede huir. Las muestras recogidas se envían a un analizador portátil y el visor del tecnosacerdote hace clic, registrando la autopsia en imágenes.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Anfrage akzeptiert." {n}Pasqal entfaltet seine Mechadendriten, die allesamt auf das Monster zustürzen. Ein kreischender Bohrer dringt tief in die Rüstung ein, während eine Klaue gierig von Metalldrähten durchzogene Fleischfetzen abtrennt. Die Kreatur windet sich und keucht, kann der gnadenlosen Vivisektion aber nicht entkommen. Die gesammelten Proben werden an einen portablen Analysator geschickt, und der Visor des Techpriesters klickt, er nimmt die Prozedur auf Vid auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request approved." {n}Pasqal eagerly unfolds his mechadendrites and they all rush toward the monster. A shrieking drill cuts deep into the armour, while a claw hungrily snaps off chunks of the flesh pierced with strands of metal wire. The creature thrashes and wheezes but cannot escape the merciless vivisection. The collected samples are sent to a portable analyser and the Tech-Priest's visor clicks, recording the procedure in pict-images.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anfrage akzeptiert." {n}Pasqal entfaltet eifrig seine Mechadendriten, die alle auf das Monster zustürzen. Der kreischende Bohrer dringt tief in die Rüstung vor. Die Klaue zwickt hungrig Fetzen des Fleischs ab, das von Metalldrähten durchzogen ist. Die Kreatur windet sich und keucht, kann der gnadenlosen Autopsie jedoch nicht entkommen. Die gesammelten Proben werden an einen portablen Analysator geschickt, und der Visor des Techpriesters klickt, er nimmt die Autopsie auf Vid auf.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Demande approuvée. » {n}Pasqal déploie ses mécadendrites en direction du monstre et une perceuse se met à l'ouvrage pour transpercer l'armure tandis qu'une pince arrache avec peut-être un peu trop d'enthousiasme les câbles métalliques reliés à même la chair. La créature a beau se débattre, elle ne peut échapper à la vivisection minutieuse de Pasqal, qui prend soin de pictocapturer chacune des étapes de son examen à l'aide de son viseur tout en envoyant les différents échantillons prélevés à un analyseur portable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request approved." {n}Pasqal eagerly unfolds his mechadendrites and they all rush toward the monster. A shrieking drill cuts deep into the armour, while a claw hungrily snaps off chunks of the flesh pierced with strands of metal wire. The creature thrashes and wheezes but cannot escape the merciless vivisection. The collected samples are sent to a portable analyser and the Tech-Priest's visor clicks, recording the procedure in pict-images.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Demande approuvée. » {n}Pasqal déploie ses mécadendrites en direction du monstre et sa perceuse se met à l'ouvrage pour transpercer son armure tandis que sa pince arrache avec peut-être un peu trop d'enthousiasme les câbles métalliques reliés à même la chair. La créature a beau se débattre, elle ne peut échapper à l'examen minutieux de Pasqal, qui prend soin de pictocapturer chacune des étapes de son autopsie à l'aide de son viseur tout en envoyant les différents échantillons prélevés à un analyseur portable.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Talep onaylandı." {n}Pasqal, mekadentritlerini hevesle yayıyor ve hızla canavara doğru yöneltiyor. Bir matkap, vızıldayarak zırhının derinliklerine iniyor; bir pençe ise aç bir edayla, metal kablo dizileriyle delinmiş etleri koparıyor. Yaratık, debelenip hırıldamasına rağmen bu acımasız, anestezisiz ameliyattan kaçamıyor. Pasqal, topladığı örnekleri portatif bir analiz cihazına yönlendiriyor. Tekno Rahip'in tıkırdayan vizörü, prosedürü foto resim olarak kaydediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Request approved." {n}Pasqal eagerly unfolds his mechadendrites and they all rush toward the monster. A shrieking drill cuts deep into the armour, while a claw hungrily snaps off chunks of the flesh pierced with strands of metal wire. The creature thrashes and wheezes but cannot escape the merciless vivisection. The collected samples are sent to a portable analyser and the Tech-Priest's visor clicks, recording the procedure in pict-images.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Talep onaylandı." {n}Pasqal mekadentritlerini hevesle yayıyor ve hızla canavara doğru yöneltiyor. Bir matkap vızıldayarak zırhının derinliklerine iniyor, bir pençe ise aç bir edayla, metal kablo dizileriyle delinmiş etleri koparıyor. Yaratık debelenip hırıldıyor ancak bu acımasız canlı ameliyattan kaçamıyor. Pasqal, topladığı örnekleri portatif bir analiz cihazına yönlendiriyor ve Tekno Rahip'in vizörü tıkırdayarak, prosedürü foto resim olarak kaydediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
